com.github.ldeitos.validation.impl.configuration

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ldeitos.validation.impl.configuration.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends Object
    Class to access ExtendedValidation component configurations.
    Author:
    Leandro Deitos

    • Method Detail

      • getConfiguration

        public static Configuration getConfiguration(ConfigInfoProvider configProvider)
        Returns:
        Unique instance to Configuration to application use.

      • getConfituredMessageFiles

        public Collection<String> getConfituredMessageFiles()
        Returns:
        Message files names configured in Constants.CONFIGURATION_FILE.

      • getConfiguredValidationClosure

        public ValidationClosure getConfiguredValidationClosure()
        Returns:
        ValidationClosure instance configured in Constants.CONFIGURATION_FILE or component default if isn't configured.

      • getConfiguredMessagesSource

        public MessagesSource getConfiguredMessagesSource()
        Returns:
        MessagesSource instance configured in Constants.CONFIGURATION_FILE or component default if isn't configured.

      • load

        public static void load(ConfigInfoProvider cp)
                 throws InvalidConfigurationException
        Load Tarcius configuration.
        Parameters:
        cp - Configuration provider.
        Throws:
        InvalidConfigurationException - In case of invalid configurations at file Constants.CONFIGURATION_FILE or this is inexistent.
        Since:
        0.1.2

      • isLoaded

        public static boolean isLoaded()
        Returns:
        true if configuration is loaded.
        Since:
        0.9.3

      • isUnloaded

        public static boolean isUnloaded()
        Returns:
        false if configuration is unloaded.
        Since:
        0.9.3
